knxUltimateHueBattery.mapping_info: Link the KNX group address that should emit the battery percentage.
knxUltimateHueBattery.behaviour_info: Configure how the sensor behaves at startup and whether to expose the Node-RED output pin.
knxUltimateHueBattery.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue battery events are still emitted to your flow.
